author: jimmygchen
content:
Also voted for 2. 

I know we also want to test some edge case scenarios (see <@531934490826768418>'s proposal below) - i was wondering if we want to test the unfinalized scenarios in a short living devnet instead? 
https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1295#issuecomment-2663706890

I think having a stable running devnet is quite useful for testing sync,  so i can just start a local node trying to sync with peers on the devnet. We are also interested to see the network can hold up long enough without forking.
